statements: DELETE FROM energy_usage WHERE id = 1 AND appliance = 'Fridge';
DELETE FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01 00:00:00' AND voice_command IS NULL;
DELETE FROM energy_usage WHERE device_id = 123 AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND command_text LIKE '%turn off%';
DELETE FROM energy_usage WHERE id = 100 AND energy_consumed > 50.0;
DELETE FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND command_type = 'trigger';
DELETE FROM VoiceCommands WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM VoiceCommands WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND command_id > 100;
